message: Let's start fair, I'll take the bigger share this time, but I'm open to negotiation later.

I'm willing to give up some more, but I think a 60/40 split is a good compromise.  Let's avoid this going on too long.
It seems we both want a larger share. How about a 60/40 split in my favor? This way we both get a decent amount.
We're getting closer to the end here. Let's split it down the middle and call it a day.
